title: Private Message
body:
Is it supposed to do this now, or is it a bug, or is it just me?

Ever since patch 6.1 was introduced, whenever i pm someone my chat appears above what they previously said, is that supposed to happen or what?

replies.body: Yeah this bug is happening to a lot of people and a fair few people are sending in support tickets about this problem hopefully riot can get it sorted out soon.
